title: Ukraine Crisis Sends Tech Stocks to Bear-Market Levels for First Time in 2 Years - Barron's
content:
1. Ukraine Crisis Sends Tech Stocks to Bear-Market Levels for First Time in 2 Years  Barron's

description: The Nasdaq indexes slipped into 20% drops from recent highs in early trading, but have since cut losses.
